hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
val_acc=$(sudo -S docker container exec model jq .validation_acc /home/admin/results/train_metadata.json) threshold=0.8
if echo "$threshold > $val_acc" | bc -l | grep -q 1 then echo 'validation accuracy is lower than the threshold, process stopped' else echo 'validation accuracy is higher than the threshold' sudo -S docker container exec model python3 test.py sudo -S docker container exec model cat /home/admin/results/train_metadata.json /home/admin/results/test_metadata.json fi
sudo -S docker rm -f model
